amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to provide $200 million (by offset) to the water users of the Klamath Project as compensation for private property taken for public use.

action.text: Mr. Wolf raised a point of order against the Herger amendment (A012). The amendment constituted legislation in an appropriations bill because the amendment sought to appropriate funds for a project not previously authorized. The Chair sustained the point of order.
